EmailTemplate.description: Notice for New SFDC Users : Device_Summary roll-out
EmailTemplate.name: Device Summary : New Salesforce User Activation notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Activation of Salesforce.com licenses for Device Summary
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Receiving_User.Name},
You have assigned with salesforce license as 1st batch user of Device Migration. You are selected as you are part of existing device team member in Siebel CRM.
Please proceed to activate your license by using the link sent by Salesforce.com. Your username is {!Receiving_User.Username}
As 1st step of Salesforce Device Migration we will roll-out Device Summary this week 28 Mar 2013 :
- Allow new/copy device directly in Salesforce, 38 fields will be visible and sync to Siebel - Manage Device Access in Opportunity Program Team- - Loading of 13K devices in salesforce and the associated device team member in Opportunity Program team.
Notes : This release does not impact to the BX-041, PTRF Validation, IP Declaration form and Export Control form which still function as normal in Siebel CRM.
You can approach Kian Ching Ng for more information on device migration.
We have strict limitation on the license count and in order to avoid additional costs associated with acquiring new licenses, we actively monitor the usage. Our expectation is that users log in once a week via Chatter, Mobile App, or standard SFDC log-in.
We maintain a dashboard {!$Label.Salesforce_Org_URL}01Z900000009gue that identifies users who have not logged in for more than 14 days. If you have not logged in beyond 30 days we will consider your account eligible for inactivation. In order for you to reactivate your account if this occurs, please contact your local Administrator.
US Malta - Albert Frank US - Vianney Gonzales, Dipty Mahbhate, Lydia (Peichung) Sung EUR - Michael Verwagner, Charles Derby APJ - Jasmine Lin, Pei Jen Cheo
In order to avoid future notification, log into SFDC once a week or contact a local administrator if you no longer need your account.
Thank you,
SFDC Admin
